titleStmt.title: The prophetical history of the reformation, or, The reformation to be reform'd in that great re-reformation that is to be 1697 according to the divine table or vision of it, Revel. 10 compared with other visions especially of the churches ... : to which is adjoyn'd The apocalyptical vision of the witnesses / by T. Beverley ...
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.

titleStmt.title: The prophetical history of the reformation, or, The reformation to be reform'd in that great re-reformation that is to be 1697 according to the divine table or vision of it, Revel. 10 compared with other visions especially of the churches ... : to which is adjoyn'd The apocalyptical vision of the witnesses / by T. notesStmt.note: B2151 (The grand apocalyptical vision of the witnesses slain), p. [1-10] at end, appears on reel 808:8, and is cataloged separately.
Probable place of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library and Huntington Library.
